mapper.insert: insert into pg_stat_replication (pid, usesysid, usename, application_name, client_addr, client_hostname, client_port, backend_start, backend_xmin, `state`, sent_lsn, write_lsn, flush_lsn, replay_lsn, write_lag, flush_lag, replay_lag, sync_priority, sync_state) values (#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usesysid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{usename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientAddr,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{clientHostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{backendStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{backendXmin,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sentLsn,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{writeLsn,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{flushLsn,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{replayLsn,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{writeLag,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{flushLag,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{replayLag,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{syncPriority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{syncState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select pid, usesysid, usename, application_name, client_addr, client_hostname, client_port, backend_start, backend_xmin, `state`, sent_lsn, write_lsn, flush_lsn, replay_lsn, write_lag, flush_lag, replay_lag, sync_priority, sync_state from pg_stat_replication
